Model.Roles

Class Role

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Roles.Role
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Lead, Programmer, Tester

    public abstract class Role
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing a Role object. This class has to be implemented by each specific role. A role can be assigned to developers only. A developer that participates in a project always has at least 1 role.
